ing: 3 cups Gala or Rome apples, peeled and chopped coarsely
2 Bartlett pears, peeled and chopped coarsely
des: "Good news: Despite popular opinion that spicy food causes headaches, there's no evidence it does, Buchholz says. So eat spices and herbs with abandon."
ins: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries pop, 25-30 minutes. Cool to room temperature or chill.
